data.name: Hell Architect Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Soundtrack of Hell Architect is now available!
Get ready to enjoy the 10 tracks of this O.S.T. to live again the atmospheres of the game.

Tracklist:

1 - Playing the Angels
2 - Black Mass
3 - Sneaky Soul
4 - Hello Darkness My Best Friend
5 - Ballad of Somber Souls
6 - Upcoming Suffering
7 - Lucifer's Anthem
8 - Shades of Lilith
9 - Plucking the Ribs of a Sinner
10 - A Hell of a Ride

File format: MP3

data.short_description: The original soundtrack from the game Hell Architect contains 10 amazing tracks that will allow you to dive into the mood of this organized hell.
